name: Movie Script Generator Agent
description: An AI agent that helps generate and analyze movie scripts

skills.name: Script Generation
skills.description: Generates movie scripts based on user input and requirements
examples: Generate a script for a romantic comedy
Create a scene with two characters having an intense argument
Write an opening scene for a sci-fi movie

skills.name: Script Analysis
skills.description: Analyzes existing scripts for structure, dialogue, and narrative elements
examples: Analyze the pacing of this script
Review the character development in this scene
Check if this dialogue sounds natural
